body: ozaki is one of the GOAT. the women do not all look the same, i can easily tell which one is which. great translation! been waiting for this one for forever.
all the women are just 1 woman who can use infinite shadow clone jutsu
This artist always have intense sex, but damn bro, can we have 1 manga, when the female pregnant or have baby because being fucked constanly? Idk bro i just want kind of realism here
Love the stories this artist makes but bro, every woman this guy draws looks exactly the same!
